EmailTemplate.name: Licensee removal notification - licensee - no employer
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} removed you from their business
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} removed you from their business on {!Associations__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
Your {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} license is now inactive.
You must accept an invitation to join a business to activate your license.
Questions? Need help? {!Associations__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov MAI015
